spaceship_ask_lock_manufacturer: Please provide the name of the lock manufacturer.
spaceship_ask_colour_top_cable: Please provide the color of the first cable.
spaceship_ask_colour_second_cable: Please provide the color of the second cable.
spaceship_inform_outcome: Ok, I can reach the control panel now... {message:s}
anything_else: Is there anything else that I can do for you?
out_of_scope: I am sorry, I don't quite understand what you mean. I am only able to help you with repairing the spaceship's life support.
